title: West Nile virus transmission vector - mosquito

content.question: West Nile virus was identified in the Western Hemisphere during the summer of 1999 and was associated with human, equine, and avian deaths. This virus is acquired by

choices.label: coming in contact with polluted water
coming in contact with a sick horse or bird
being bitten by an infected mosquito

content.answer: being bitten by an infected mosquito
